environment.COBALT: A job scheduler used to allocate resources (nodes, time, queue)
environment.JULIA_NUM_THREADS: Number of threads to be used by Julia
environment.OPENBLAS_NUM_THREADS: Number of threads to be used by OpenBLAS

libraries.MPI: Message Passing Interface library used for parallel processing
libraries.OpenBLAS: Optimized Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms library

resources.queue: skylake_8180 queue on the COBALT system
